txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Broken short bows from the brigands north of Oatbarton. You can make the delivery to Ponto Oats at Oatbarton centre.
'I will make certain to show these to the other townsfolk. It is good to know that there are people out there willing to help. Thank you.'
'The big folk that ran the townsfolk out of Dwaling need to learn some manners. Maybe you can bring some proof that you are working toward that end.'
Mathom Society Task: Broken Short Bows
The townsfolk in Oatbarton await the delivery of broken short bows to Ponto Oats at the centre of the town.
Deliver the broken short bows to Ponto Oats at Oatbarton
You have been tasked with collecting and delivering broken short bows from the brigands north of Oatbarton. You are to deliver the items to Ponto Oats at the centre of the town of Oatbarton.
Wanted: Broken short bows from the brigands north of Oatbarton.
